name: Death is Coming and I Have Set Up My Chessboard
name_original: Death is Coming and I Have Set Up My Chessboard
description:
Death is Coming and I Have Set Up My Chessboard is a tiny journalling game about reflecting on your life when you know you're going to die. You'll try to beat death at chess and extend your life, but we all know that's not going to work.

You can read all of it in the preview images. If you like it, you can download the files and print it yourself. Give lots to your friends. If you really, really like it you can order one printed on die cut thick card from our website. We have lots of other cool stuff there and it's a great way to support us making more cool things.
